isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - PRO SLEEPER ELECTRICAL SYSTEM - LIGHTING, ACCESSORIES AND TRAILER SOCKET - AUXILIARY CIRCULATION FAN

svcproc.title: AUXILIARY CIRCULATION FAN
svcproc.para:
Refer to circuit diagram on
, for the following discussion.

Power (key ON or OFF) from B2 battery stud is applied through cab 30A fuse F10-B, to sleeper 10A fuse 582-B. The power from 582-B is applied to the fan switch (part of fan assembly). The fan motor is grounded through sleeper/cab connector (472) to cab ground adapter (454).
